page.description: Submit the Detail View part to commit any edits that were made to the record shown in the Detail View.

argument.name: newRecord
argument.description: If true, a new record will be shown after the record is saved.

section.description: If you supply an optional argument of true, then the record is saved and a new record is shown. This allows you to do continuous data entry.
section.example: //Submit the detail view and then immediately start entering a new record {grid.Object}.submitDetailView(true);
